name: Bärchenberg
description:
This is my very first Game i made. It has not much Gameplay and is more luck based, but i have fun play it by myself.

You are a little Rabbit, who fell in love with a little Bear. The Bear is holding a nap over the Winter and told the Rabbit that they'll meet on a little Hill when spring is coming. Now it's springtime and the Rabbit is looking for this Hill and his big love. But he has to be aware of the Bad-Bears!
